body: Using mobile communications equipment is becoming increasingly important in the conduct of business and personal affairs.  However, you must not compromise your own or others’ safety when using such equipment.  Mobile communications can enhance personal safety and security when appropriately used, particularly in emergency situations.  Safety must be paramount when using mobile communications equipment to avoid negating these benefits.  Mobile communication equipment includes, but is not limited to, cellular phones, pagers, portable email devices, text messaging devices and portable two-way radios.
